detaileddescription.para: Holds the numerical code of the event. For a list of all possible codes refer to `io.FileStreamEventCode`.
Holds the synchronization ID of the event. This field should be used for discarding of the events which have been delivered late due to scheduling [#f1]_.
Holds extended error information for error events. Currently this field is only used by `io.FileStreamEventCode.IoError`.

briefdescription.para: This struct contains detailed information about the event occured on `io.FileStream` object.

detaileddescription.para: Pointer to the instance of this struct is the only argument passed to the subscribers of `io.FileStream.m_onFileStreamEvent`.
